title: VRMMO: Passing of the Sword - Novel Updates
tags: Cold Protagonist   Futuristic Setting   Game Elements   Game Ranking System   Gamers   Gods   Level System   Loneliness   Loner Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Past Plays a Big Role   Post-apocalyptic   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Special Abilities   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   System Administrator   Tragic Past   Virtual Reality   Wars
author: Calmly Looking Towards The Maple Snow   静望枫雪
description:
This isn't a game designed just for entertainment, and it didn't just appear in front of me for no reason - even the class I received wasn't a coincidence. This truly is such a hateful world...but since it’s already come, I can only take up that broken sword once again.

In the name of the Sword of Hope I discarded, I will rid this chaotic world of evil! I will step on the path of endless darkness, cutting down all evils that disturb the world!>
